sqlMap.insert:
insert into ZC_BAL_CHG_HT_BI (ZC_HT_CODE, ZC_BI_NO, ZC_BI_BCSY_SUM, ZC_MAKE_CODE, ZC_BI_YJJS_SUM, ZC_BI_HTBA_SUM, ZC_BI_YJCH_SUM, ZC_BI_NZJZ_SUM,ZC_PRO_BI_SEQ, ZC_BI_SUM,ZC_BI_DO_SUM,ZC_BI_YJBA_SUM,BI_TARGET_CODE,B_ACC_CODE, B_ACC_NAME,CO_CODE,CO_NAME,DEC_MONEY,FUND_CODE,FUND_NAME, INCEPTDOC_CODE,INCEPTDOC_NAME,MANAGE_CODE,MANAGE_NAME,ND, ORG_CODE,ORG_NAME,ORIGIN_CODE,ORIGIN_NAME,OUTLAY_CODE,OUTLAY_NAME, PAYOUT_CODE,PAYOUT_NAME,PAYTYPE_CODE,PAYTYPE_NAME,PROJECT_CODE, PROJECT_NAME,PROJECT_TYPE_CODE,PROJECT_TYPE_NAME,SENDDOC_CODE, SENDDOC_NAME,SENDDOC_TYPE_CODE,SENDDOC_TYPE_NAME,ZC_CG_TYPE, ZC_PLAN_TYPE,ZC_SAVE_NUM,ZC_CATALOGUE_CODE,ZC_CATALOGUE_NAME, ZC_YEAR,ZC_YEP_SUM,ZC_BI_APD_FLAG,ZC_FUND_REMARK,ZC_FUND_FILE, ZC_FUND_FILE_BLOBID,ZC_USE_BI_ID,BAL_CHG_ID) values (#bi.zcHtCode:VARCHAR#, #bi.zcBiNo:VARCHAR#, #bi.zcBiBcsySum:DECIMAL#, #bi.zcMakeCode:VARCHAR#, #bi.zcBiYjjsSum:DECIMAL#, #bi.zcBiHtbaSum:DECIMAL#, #bi.zcBiYjchSum:DECIMAL#, #bi.zcBiNzjzSum:DECIMAL#,
SEQ_ZC_PRO_BI.NEXTVAL
#bi.zcProBiSeq#
,#bi.zcBiSum:DECIMAL#,#bi.zcBiDoSum:DECIMAL#,#bi.zcBiYjbaSum:DECIMAL#, #bi.biTargetCode:VARCHAR#,#bi.bAccCode:VARCHAR#,#bi.bAccName:VARCHAR#, #bi.coCode:VARCHAR#,#bi.coName:VARCHAR#,#bi.decMoney:DECIMAL#, #bi.fundCode:VARCHAR#,#bi.fundName:VARCHAR#,#bi.inceptdocCode:VARCHAR#, #bi.inceptdocName:VARCHAR#,#bi.manageCode:VARCHAR#,#bi.manageName:VARCHAR#, #bi.nd:VARCHAR#,#bi.orgCode:VARCHAR#,#bi.orgName:VARCHAR#, #bi.originCode:VARCHAR#,#bi.originName:VARCHAR#,#bi.outlayCode:VARCHAR#, #bi.outlayName:VARCHAR#,#bi.payoutCode:VARCHAR#,#bi.payoutName:VARCHAR#, #bi.paytypeCode:VARCHAR#,#bi.paytypeName:VARCHAR#,#bi.projectCode:VARCHAR#, #bi.projectName:VARCHAR#,#bi.projectTypeCode:VARCHAR#, #bi.projectTypeName:VARCHAR#,#bi.senddocCode:VARCHAR#, #bi.senddocName:VARCHAR#,#bi.senddocTypeCode:VARCHAR#, #bi.senddocTypeName:VARCHAR#,#bi.zcCgType:VARCHAR#,#bi.zcPlanType:VARCHAR#, #bi.zcSaveNum:DECIMAL#,#bi.zcCatalogueCode:VARCHAR#, #bi.zcCatalogueName:VARCHAR#,#bi.zcYear:VARCHAR#,#bi.zcYepSum:DECIMAL#, #bi.zcBiApdFlag:VARCHAR#,#bi.zcFundRemark:VARCHAR#,#bi.zcFundFile:VARCHAR#, #bi.zcFundFileBlobid:VARCHAR#,#bi.zcUseBiId:VARCHAR#,#balChgId:VARCHAR#)
sqlMap.delete: delete from ZC_BAL_CHG_HT_BI BI where BI.BAL_CHG_ID=#BAL_CHG_ID#
sqlMap.select: select BAL_CHG_ID,ZC_HT_CODE,ZC_BI_NO,ZC_BI_BCSY_SUM,ZC_MAKE_CODE,ZC_BI_YJJS_SUM,ZC_BI_HTBA_SUM,ZC_BI_YJCH_SUM,ZC_BI_NZJZ_SUM,ZC_PRO_BI_SEQ, zc_bi_sum,zc_bi_do_sum,zc_bi_yjba_sum,bi_target_code,b_acc_code,b_acc_name,co_code,co_name,dec_money,fund_code,fund_name, inceptdoc_code,inceptdoc_name,manage_code,manage_name,nd,org_name,origin_code,origin_name,outlay_code,outlay_name,payout_code,payout_name, paytype_code,paytype_name,project_code,project_name,project_type_code,project_type_name,senddoc_code,senddoc_name,senddoc_type_code,senddoc_type_name, zc_cg_type,zc_plan_type,zc_save_num,zc_catalogue_code,zc_catalogue_name,zc_year,zc_yep_sum,zc_bi_apd_flag,zc_fund_remark,zc_use_bi_id,zc_fund_file,zc_fund_file_blobid FROM ZC_BAL_CHG_HT_BI MASTER where BAL_CHG_ID=#BAL_CHG_ID:VARCHAR# and ZC_HT_CODE=#ZC_HT_CODE:VARCHAR# order by zc_pro_bi_seq
select count(*) FROM ZC_BAL_CHG_HT_BI MASTER where BAL_CHG_ID=#BAL_CHG_ID:VARCHAR#
